flawed_nl_solution:
8 years ago James had 20-8=<<20-8=12>>12 years
So 8 years ago John had 12*2=24 years experience
That means John has 24+8=<<24+8=32>>32 years experience
So Mike has 32-16=<<32-16=61>>61 years of experience
So together they have 20+32+61=<<20+32+61=113>>113 years experience
#### 113

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
